1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.1: And David being old and full of days, made Solomon his son king over Israel.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.2: And he gathered together all the princes of Israel, and the priests and Levites.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.3: And the Levites were numbered from the age of thirty years, and upwards: and there were found of them thirty-eight thousand men.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.4: Of these twenty-four thousand were chosen, and distributed unto the ministry of the house of the Lord: and six thousand were the overseers and judges.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.5: Moreover four thousand were porters: and as many singers singing to the Lord with the instruments, which he had made to sing with.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.6: And David distributed them into courses by the families of the sons of Levi, to wit, of Gerson, and of Caath, and of Merari.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.7: The sons of Gerson were Leedan and Semei.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.8: The sons of Leedan: the chief Jahiel, and Zethan, and Joel, three.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.9: The sons of Semei: Salomith, and Hosiel, and Aran, three: these were the heads of the families of Leedan.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.10: And the sons of Semei were Leheth, and Ziza, and Jaus, and Baria: these were the sons of Semei, four.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.11: And Leheth was the first, Ziza the second: but Jaus and Baria had not many children, and therefore they were counted in one family, and in one house.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.12: The sons of Caath were Amram, and Isaar, Hebron, and Oziel, four.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.13: The sons of Amram, Aaron, and Moses. And Aaron was separated to minister in the holy of holies, he and his sons for ever, and to burn incense before the Lord, according to his ceremonies, and to bless his name for ever.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.14: The sons also of Moses, the man of God, were numbered in the tribe of Levi.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.15: The sons of Moses were Gersom and Eliezer:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.16: The sons of Gersom: Subuel the first.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.17: And the sons of Eliezer were: Rohobia the first: and Eliezer had no more sons. But the sons of Rohobia were multiplied exceedingly.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.18: The sons of Isaar: Salomith the first.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.19: The sons of Hebron: Jeriau the first, Amarias the second, Jahaziel the third, Jecmaam the fourth.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.20: The sons of Oziel: Micha the first, Jesia the second.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.21: The sons of Merari: Moholi, and Musi. The sons of Moholi: Eleazar and Cia.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.22: And Eleazar died, and had no sons but daughters: and the sons of Cis their brethren took them.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.23: The sons of Musi: Moholi, and Eder, and Jerimoth, three.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.24: These are the sons of Levi in their kindreds and families, princes by their courses, and the number of every head that did the works of the ministry of the house of the Lord from twenty years old and upward.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.25: For David said: The Lord the God of Israel hath given rest to his people, and a habitation in Jerusalem for ever.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.26: And it shall not be the office of the Levites to carry any more the tabernacle, and all the vessels for the service thereof.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.27: So according to the last precepts of David, the sons of Levi are to be numbered from twenty years old and upward.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.28: And they are to be under the hand of the sons of Aaron for the service of the house of the Lord, in the porches, and in the chambers, and in the place of purification, and in the sanctuary, and in all the works of the ministry of the temple of the Lord.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.29: And the priests have the charge of the leaves of proposition, and of the sacrifice of fine flour, and of the unleavened cakes, and of the fryingpan, and of the roasting, and of every weight and measure.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.30: And the Levites are to stand in the morning to give thanks, and to sing praises to the Lord: and in like manner in the evening,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.31: As well in the oblation of the holocausts of the Lord, as in the sabbaths and in the new moons, and the rest of the solemnities, according to the number and ceremonies prescribed for every thing, continually before the Lord.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__23.32: And let them keep the observances of the tabernacle of the covenant, and the ceremonies of the sanctuary, and the charge of the sons of Aaron their brethren, that they may minister in the house of the Lord.
